## IndexPatternsService.hasUserIndexPattern() method

Checks if current user has a user created index pattern ignoring fleet's server default index patterns

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasUserIndexPattern(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`
